news.title: ‘Shocking and disturbing’ that some gardaí ignored offences given importance of roads policing in ‘saving lives’, Drew Harris says
news.summary: A lack of sanctions for poor performance and the absence of effective management led to a 'culture to take root' in roads policing units whereby some gardaí deliberately avoided traffic offences.

news.title: Martha Nolan-O’Slat­arra’s family seek second post-mortem as mother and sister prepare to bring body home from US
news.summary: The family of a young Irish woman found dead on a boat in the US are seeking a second-opinion post-mortem ­examination to determine the cause of her death.

news.title: Man (40s) killed and woman seriously injured after two-car crash in Co Limerick
news.summary: A man has died at the scene of a two-car crash in Co Limerick this morning.

news.title: Former owner of HR company Denyse O’Brien is granted bail after being charged with 98 fraud offences
news.summary: The former owner of a human resources company has appeared in court charged with a total of 98 separate fraud offences.

news.title: Eddie Howe’s friends run Liverpool and that is why Alexander Isak saga is personal
news.summary: As unlikely as it may seem, the relationships at the heart of the transfer saga that has dominated the summer can be traced all the way back to Portsmouth in the early 2000s, when Alexander Isak was just a toddler.

news.title: Senan Molony: Does Covid-19 firefighter Tony Holohan have what it takes to win the Áras?
news.summary: Tony Holohan has strong facial recognition with the public, but as he considers a run for the Áras the trouble may be that he is associated with times of societal stress.

news.title: How to reverse weight gain in your 40s and 50s with Professor Donal O’Shea
news.summary: Why are women aged 44 to 59 seeing some of the sharpest rises in weight gain? Is it menopause and hormones or the rush of modern life? And what role do medications like Ozempic and Mounjaro play?

news.title: Credit unions cleared to more than triple mortgage and business lending
news.summary: Credit unions will be able to more than triple their current mortgage and business lending after the Central Bank gave the go-ahead to changes to lending regulations for the sector.

news.title: Chrissie Russell: Bring a baby to a tennis match by all means, but know there’s only one racket that’s welcome on court
news.summary: I don’t think the starters had even been served when the crying started. It was a fancy restaurant I’d been dying to try, and the food looked incredible, but there was nothing else for it – I had to leave.

news.title: Grieving parents of Harvey Morrison Sherratt (9) vow to fight for other children with scoliosis as surgery waiting list increases
news.summary: The number of children waiting for scoliosis surgery has risen again since the Government took office in January, up from 112 to 131.
